step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move.
Excellent work maintaining shoulder height and form. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
Great job returning to the starting position. Ensure your fists are closed and muscles are tight.
You're doing well with the outward arm movement and muscle relaxation. Keep up the good work!
Good start for the second repetition, keeping your fists closed and arms drawn in. Remember to inhale and tighten.
Well done opening your hands and extending your arms. Continue to exhale and relax as you move.
Excellent control throughout the movement. You're maintaining good shoulder height and form.
Great job returning to the starting position. Ensure your fists are tight and muscles engaged.
You've completed the exercise well! Remember to focus on the outward movement and muscle relaxation.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and muscles engaged when bringing your arms in, and relax as you extend them outwards. Continue practicing this smooth, controlled motion.
